subtitle: Just two ingredients: frozen raspberries and sugar.

method.text: Place the raspberries in a large saucepan. Add the sugar. Heat gently for 8-10 min until sugar has dissolved. Remove from heat.
Crush the raspberries with a fork. Strain the mixture through a muslin-lined sieve overnight.
Pour into a clean dry bottle. Seal, label and store in the fridge for up to 1 week.

title: Raspberry cordial
